Package dontlookback

Enum Class GameState

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<GameState>
dontlookback.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<GameState>, Constable
public enum GameState extends Enum<GameState>
Comprehensive Game State Enumeration Defines all possible game states for comprehensive state-based context management. States are categorized as: - Universal states (apply everywhere): PAUSED, LOADING, MENU, etc. - Area-based states: SAFE, UNSAFE, etc. - Player-based states: HIDING, etc. - Monster/AI-based states: SEEN, UNSEEN, etc. - Gameplay outcome states: WIN, LOSE, etc.
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team

    Starting/tutorial area with guidance

    UNSEEN

Don't Look Back - Horror Survival Game Engine

Built with Java 17, LWJGL 3.3.4, JBox2D | GitHub Repository | Report Issues
